Yandex Disk.name: F02a.01
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose that it directly notifies users about all changes to its terms of service?

Yandex Disk.name: F02a.02
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose how it will directly notify users of changes?

Yandex Disk.name: F02a.03
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose the timeframe within which it directly notifies users of changes prior to these changes coming into effect?

Yandex Disk.name: F02a.04
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company maintain a public archive or change log?
